body_html:
I had a similar issue (ref #2324) ,

I tried your recommendation. Now when I run: bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer --verbose_failures

I get the following errors:

ERROR: /home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD:14:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD", line 14
cc_library(name = "cc_op_gen_main", srcs = ["..."], <3 more arguments>)
File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD", line 21, in cc_library
tf_copts()
File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl", line 98, in tf_copts
"-DEIGEN_AVOID_STL_ARRAY" + if_cuda(["-DGOOGLE_CUDA=1"])
'+' operator applied to incompatible types (string, select of list).
ERROR: /home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD:28:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD", line 28
tf_gen_op_wrappers_cc(name = "cc_ops", op_lib_names = ["...", <17 more arguments>], <3 more arguments>)
File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl", line 174, in tf_gen_op_wrappers_cc
tf_gen_op_wrapper_cc(n, "ops/" + n, pkg = pkg)
File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl", line 127, in tf_gen_op_wrapper_cc
native.cc_binary(name = tool, copts = tf_copts(), lin..."], <2 more arguments>)
File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl", line 129, in native.cc_binary
tf_copts()
File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl", line 98, in tf_copts
"-DEIGEN_AVOID_STL_ARRAY" + if_cuda(["-DGOOGLE_CUDA=1"])
'+' operator applied to incompatible types (string, select of list).
ERROR: /home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD:61:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD", line 61
cc_binary(name = "tutorials_example_traine...", <4 more arguments>)
File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD", line 64, in cc_binary
tf_copts()
File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl", line 98, in tf_copts
"-DEIGEN_AVOID_STL_ARRAY" + if_cuda(["-DGOOGLE_CUDA=1"])
'+' operator applied to incompatible types (string, select of list).
ERROR: no such target '//tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer': target 'tutorials_example_trainer' not declared in package 'tensorflow/cc' defined by /home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD.

body:
I had a similar issue (ref https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2324) ,  

I tried your recommendation.   Now when I run: bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer --verbose_failures

I get the following errors:

ERROR: /home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD:14:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD", line 14
        cc_library(name = "cc_op_gen_main", srcs = ["..."], <3 more arguments>)
    File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD", line 21, in cc_library
        tf_copts()
    File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl", line 98, in tf_copts
        "-DEIGEN_AVOID_STL_ARRAY" + if_cuda(["-DGOOGLE_CUDA=1"])
'+' operator applied to incompatible types (string, select of list).
ERROR: /home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD:28:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD", line 28
        tf_gen_op_wrappers_cc(name = "cc_ops", op_lib_names = ["...", <17 more arguments>], <3 more arguments>)

        tf_gen_op_wrapper_cc(n, "ops/" + n, pkg = pkg)
    File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl", line 127, in tf_gen_op_wrapper_cc
        native.cc_binary(name = tool, copts = tf_copts(), lin..."], <2 more arguments>)
    File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl", line 129, in native.cc_binary
        tf_copts()
    File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl", line 98, in tf_copts
        "-DEIGEN_AVOID_STL_ARRAY" + if_cuda(["-DGOOGLE_CUDA=1"])
'+' operator applied to incompatible types (string, select of list).
ERROR: /home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD:61:1: Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/home/julialintern/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD", line 61
        cc_binary(name = "tutorials_example_traine...", <4 more arguments>)
